aboutd.title: Our Story
aboutd.quote: Wood is not just a material, it's a soul that we sculpt for your home.

story.part1: For over 10 years, Decorna has established itself as a reference in artisanal joinery in Casablanca. Our adventure began in a small workshop, guided by a single obsession: the perfection of the line and respect for the wood fiber.
story.part2: We select our wood species with absolute rigor, favoring sustainable sources to guarantee not only beauty, but also the longevity of every piece that leaves our workshop.
